title: Alexandrite
description: Alexandrite is a variety of the gem species chrysoberyl, well-known for its chatoyancy or “cat's eye” effect when cabbed.
author: Jhon doe

title: Ruby
description: A ruby is a pink-ish red to blood-red colored gemstone, a variety of the mineral corundum (aluminium oxide).
date: A ruby is a pink-ish red to blood-red colored gemstone, a variety of the mineral corundum (aluminium oxide).
author: technonazmul

title: Ruby Fluorescence
description: Gemstone composed of transparent red corundum (q.v.), a mineral form of aluminum oxide, Al2O3.
author: rasselmrh
